import'./login.css' import logo from '../NavBar/my_logo.jpg' import userAddon from './user.png' import passwordAddon from './password.png' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' function LogIn () { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch('/api/v1/auth/register', { method : 'POST', crossDomain : true, headers : { "content-Type": "application/json", Accept : "application/json", "Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"" }, body : JSON.stringify({ userName, password, email }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then((data) => console.log(data, 'userRegistered')) } return( <>
) } export default LogIn
